name: School of Women's Studies
description: School of Women’s Studies (SWS), Jadavpur University, was established in January 1988 and was included in the UGC women’s studies programme in February 1989. The School was a nodal centre in the eastern region during the 9th Plan Period. With the expansion in terms of mentoring, developing teaching and research materials and consolidating the process of professionalization of the discipline, the School was granted the status of Advanced Centre in Women’s Studies by the UGC in June 2011. At present, the School runs PhD, MPhil and General Elective teaching programmes.
